name: ShareNship
overview:
Sharenship is a web platform that provides its users who ship internationally a way to share shipping container.

Many international shippers who ship less container load or LCL most often pay more than those who ship full load container. To address this problem, Sharenship came up with a platform that provides its users with LCL invite other shippers to share a container by adding their listings on the website.

Any registered users who find and willing to share a container has an ability to send a private message to a listing owner. Users can also renew their listing once expired or upgrade to Featured listings that will place a listing on the first page.

Who can use Sharenship? Sharenship is for individuals, small businesses and non profit organizations. All these groups most often work on a very limited budget. Every single dollar that can be saved is greatly beneficial to them and that’s the main goal Sharenship is trying to reach.
